title: Opening Ceremonies
description: Join us as our Con Chairs welcome you to CanFURence 7 - As Seen on TV, and preview some of the events we have in store as we kick off the weekend!

title: Your First Con
description: Welcome to CanFURence! Never been to a Furry Convention? Or even Never been to Ottawa before? If this is your first event, or first CanFURence event - this is the panel you should try to attend! We welcome experienced folks as well, with the content geared towards welcoming our newest guests! Act NOW!

title: LIVE! Charity Auction
description: Take a chance on a bid, to try and win some unique and amazing items in the charity auction. Remember it's all for the cute animals.

title: The Lyrebird’s Cage
description: Welcome to The Lyrebird's Cage, a gameshow hosted by Xenowulf with aspects from older classic game shows like The Liars Club to newer shows like Um, Actually. Audience participation is highly encouraged and are welcome to be Contestants. So will you be able to figure out what is the truth and what is not inside The Lyrebird's Cage?

title: Dead <s>Dog</s> Bunny
description: The convention might be over, but the music and dancing keeps going! Dead Do-, err, Dead Bunny! Feli is here with all the fun!

title: Closing Ceremonies
description: Grab a seat while we tune in on how many people joined us this year, how many critters were here, and how much money was donated.  But wait! Don't leave until you've seen what our next year's event will be!

title: Damiano's Elysium (feat. Anubis) LIVE!
description: Do you enjoy live music and performance? If the answer is yes, this panel is for you! Damiano’s Elysium (aka Anubis Tenebrous’ original music project) will be hitting the CanFURence stage once again, with songs telling stories of great adventures and battles. The show will be over an hour in length, with special video segments interspersed between songs in the spirit of the theme for this year (As Seen on TV). Not only will Anubis be celebrating the official release of his latest single “The Journey of No Return”, he will also be debuting new songs from his next album entitled “The Infectious Thorn”, to be released at the start of 2025. The show will include on-stage sword fights, live guitar solos, audience participation…all elements of a show you won't want to miss!

title: Fursuit Walkies
description:
*******7pm to 8pm is the MEETING MUSTER SPOT for this event*******

This event will be leaving the hotel at 8pm to go on a two hour walking tour of downtown Ottawa. 


Join us in downtown Ottawa as we explore Canada's capital on a fursuit and photographer friendly evening walk. Check out major sites only a few blocks from the hotel!

title: Nub Club
description: Do you have a nub tail? Come join us for a nub club meet up!

title: Saturday Night Dance 1
description: The night is young, and so are we! End every day of the convention by shaking your tail and waving your paws to the beats of our talented DJs, as they keep the music going all night long! The dances are for all ages, but please be aware that it is catered to adults and features a dark environment, loud music, bright strobing lighting, and fog/haze effects.

title: Saturday Night Dance 2
description: The night is young, and so are we! End every day of the convention by shaking your tail and waving your paws to the beats of our talented DJs, as they keep the music going all night long! The dances are for all ages, but please be aware that it is catered to adults and features a dark environment, loud music, bright strobing lighting, and fog/haze effects.

title: Saturday Night Dance 3
description: The night is young, and so are we! End every day of the convention by shaking your tail and waving your paws to the beats of our talented DJs, as they keep the music going all night long! The dances are for all ages, but please be aware that it is catered to adults and features a dark environment, loud music, bright strobing lighting, and fog/haze effects.

title: Saturday Night Dance 4
description: The night is young, and so are we! End every day of the convention by shaking your tail and waving your paws to the beats of our talented DJs, as they keep the music going all night long! The dances are for all ages, but please be aware that it is catered to adults and features a dark environment, loud music, bright strobing lighting, and fog/haze effects.

title: Culturally F'd Turns 10! Screening and Q&A
description: Culturally F'd! The Ursa Major Award winning video series celebrates 10 years of making videos by, about and for furries, exploring the many different forms of media that furries take part in and celebrate. Screening episodes from "Fursuit History" "The Bone Zone" "Puplift: A Dogs Guide to Space" and more! The first half of the panel is a screening of select Culturally F'd videos, followed by a Q&A with show creator Arrkay.

title: A beginner's guide to Competitive Pokémon
description: Wank to know to get started with playing Pokemon competitively, or be a competitive Pokemon player in the next big tournament. Come chat with a pro and see what it is all about.

title: The wonderful world of mermaids
description: Have you ever wondered about the wonderful underwater world of mermaids? Come learn all about mermaids and mermen from a professional mermaid (yes that’s a thing!) Let's talk about tails, swimming and safety and maybe some stories from under the depths.

title: Minty's Animation Workshop
description: Join fan animator turned industry professional Minty Root in a discussion of the process of animation creation for independent projects and large scale studio productions. Get to learn how you too can make your own animations using tools you already own.

title: Writing Wolf's Journey
description: Are you interested in writing in furry? I have been working on a multi year webcomic and I will delve into the world on how to create and build a story and comic.

title: Rank Those FURRY Sports Mascots!
description: Ranking sports mascots by how furry they are on a Tiermaker-style scale (A-F, and then a special S rank for the super furry!) Crowd, prepare to cheer for your favorite and jeer for your.... not so favorites... Which corporate furry will reign supreme?!

title: Furry Trading post
description: Come and trade your stickers, charms, sketches, plushes, pins, and more! A casual trade setting to chat and swap items and trinkets.

title: Grey Muzzles
description: Old in body but not in Soul? Come join your fellow greymuzzle in a meet and greet to reminisce about the great days of old! As a bonus, we’ll even make sure you get back home for a nap!

title: Benefactors Meal
description: Join us for yet another Epicurean extravaganza with this one of a kind Meal ( For Benefactor levels only)

title: Pup Play 101
description: Have you ever wanted to be a puppy? Ever felt like just barking at something/someone? Ever want to get down on all fours and chase around a ball? Or ever just been inexplicably fascinated with a squeaky toy? Then unleash your inner pup and join us as we explore the wonderful and ever growing world of pup/pet play. We will take you on a journey into the mind of a pup/pet as we discuss and answer the questions of, what is pup/pet play? Where did it all start? How are puppies and furries different? How are they similar? Why become a pup/pet? What is pup headspace? What is a handler and what do they do? How do I get started/involved? And where can I learn more? We'll also cover important safety aspects, basic rules and guidelines to follow, and gear you may see.

title: Shibari 101: Tying the Knot
description: Learn about safety and some basic ties of the rope arts of shibari. Basic things include safety equipment, types of rope, rope care and some basic ties.

title: PLUSHIES!
description: Plushies! The soft squishy things that we cuddle or surround ourselves with to keep us safe from the things that go bump in the dark! A companion we take with us on our journeys through life. A friend we can hug and hold tighter than ever without worry of hurting them when we need someone close through our toughest times. Or spend our hard earned cash on becoming a living plushie so you can spread the love of plushies! If this sounds like something for you then, this panel is for you! The plushie panel is back for another year! Come join us for a Show and Tell social gathering about all things PLUSHIES! No matter how big or small it is(within reason), be sure to bring it or a story about it! Because, all things PLUSHIES are welcomed! We'll discuss everything from care/maintenance, collecting/acquiring/selling, creation/design, Plushsuits and all the love and joy they bring into our lives! This is a G rated panel but, Littles/Middles/Bigs are welcomed!

title: Kemono Meet & Greet
description: Are you a fan of Kemono art and fursuits? Then this event might be for you! Hang out, chat, take some photos, and meet your fellow enjoyers of Kemono!

title: Pigeon Appreciation Panel
description: Coo-ing all pigeon lovers and fans! Join us as we celebrate our often overlooked feathered friends. Hosts will set up coloring sheets, and fun informational games for guests to enjoy. (No live animals will be present).

title: Second Child of the Revenge of the Vengeance
Convention Horror Stories!
description:
In the event-running circuit, hilarious stories are especially common. With conventions, the dedicated folks who staff and run events are members of an elite squad known as Convention Volunteers. These are their stories. (Dun-dun.)

Join Conreeaght & special guest raconteurs for hilarious retellings of events long past. This is a charity fundraising panel with all proceeds going to the chosen CanFURence charity. The more raised - the more hilarious the stories shared.

title: From the Director's Chair
description: Want to get a more in depth experience behind the scenes of running and hosting CanFURence? Please join Xenowulf and other past and present BoD members as they discuss processes and items that have shaped the past, present and future of CanFURence.

title: Inkmasters
description: Game show type panel- asking contestants to create a tattoo design with random funny prompts. Winning contestant will walk away with a prize. We are also looking for 3 “canvases” who would be willing to have a design drawn onto them.

title: Meet the Guests of Honor
description: Welcome to CanFURence Night Live! With our esteemed guests of honor: Aver the Dorbley and Grace Craft. Get to know more about their talent and history, with any questions you may have while we shine the spotlight. Filmed before a live CanFURence audience.

title: Dance Comp Tryouts
description:
Step right up and shimmy into the spotlight! Our hosts Bemani and BT are calling YOU to show off your moves in our spectacular Dance Competition!

Whether you're a seasoned jitterbug or just love to boogie, this is your chance to shine in front of our studio audience.

Sorry these auditions are not filmed in front of a live studio audience.

title: Dance - H2Ott
description: Join H2Ott as they spin Europop

title: Dances - DJ Khaki
description: Join DJ Khaki as they spin Trance

title: Dances - DJ_Huwls
description: Join DJ_Huwls as they spin Hard Trance

title: Dances - Ferretone
description: Come join Ferretone as they spin some Hardstyle

title: Practical Furry Photography
description: Tips on getting better pictures, overcoming the unique challenges of taking photos at a convention, and having furries as subjects; no matter what kind of camera you use!

title: A Queerer History of Furry
description: You are already aware of the history of the furry fandom, but when, how and why did furries get to be SO QUEER? In this talk, Arrkay from the award winning video series "Culturally F'd" takes a second look into the queer origins of the furry fandom. Our journey takes us through homophobia fueled flame wars, a convention described as a "pride parade on acid", all the way to litterboxes in classrooms. Together we'll peer into the past of queer and trans furry artists, marches, frolics and raves, and even some pre-fandom stuff just for fun.

title: Animation Industry Talk
description: A Q&A with real life animators giving stories, advice and insight about the animation industry's past, present and future. What are some fun stories from the past few years? How has studio closures and AI changed things? What does the future look like? And sagely advice for anyone looking to learn the craft.

title: MILFURS "Stories of Service"
description: This panel will be a MilFURS and Public Service members meet allowing story time for Audience Interaction.

title: THOSE DARN CANADIAN CARTOONS TURNED ME INTO A
description: Are you CANADIAN? Did you HAVE A TELEVISION SET in the 80s, 90s, or early 2000s? Were you INUNDATED with FURRY CARTOONS and LIVE ACTION MASCOT PROGRAMS, sponsored by THE GOVERNMENT OF CANADA (kinda, thanks grant system!) and now you're a FURRY?! You may be entitled to compensation... AKA, calling out what turned you into a furry in this panel. We were there. And now we're here. Time to yell about it!

title: Furry Psychology with Furscience!
description: Ever wonder what makes furries tick? Now's your chance to find out! Let Dr. Nuka - a real psychologist - take you through more than a decade of research about this weird and wonderful fandom of ours! Whether you're new to the fandom or a veteran greymuzzle, you're sure to learn something!

title: Genderverse Furries Social
description: Return to the cosmic adventure of the Genderverse once more! Hang out and unwind in an inclusive and supportive social environment with other trans/nonbinary furs, or if you have a friend or loved one who is!

title: Enamel Pin Trading
description: Bring your enamel pin trading books and trade with other enthusiasts. Any types of enamel pins are welcome (fursona, disney, fandom, etc)

title: Avian furmeet
description: A meet and greet for birds, birbs and any avian- or aligned - furries!

title: Patrons Feast
description: Fellow Patrons come enjoy your fine meal with your fellow furs

title: Bluey Watch Party
description: Come watch bluey episodes with us!!

title: Babyfur Meet & Greet
description: Just a place for babyfur's to meet up and chat. Camp FurCub will provide games and coloring supplies. We hope to set up a projector to have cartoons playing.

title: Friday - Dealers
description: Dealers Den

title: Hellaverse Watch Party
description: Come meet some new friends as we watch Hazbin Hotel and Helluva Boss. New watchers are welcome, but later episodes may be played that contain finale spoilers.

title: World of Warcraft Furries
description: A simple panel for everyone who plays World of Warcraft to come hang out! Meet new friends to play with.

title: Automotive Enthusiast Meet and Greet
description: A meet and greet for furry car enthusiasts to share their love for all things high-octane!

title: Vore? At my convention?
description:
After Dark (18+)  

Presenting and discussing this weird subgenre of our fandom. Includes a short Powerpoint, creation/presentation of statistics, audience participation gameshow, and some leftover time for meet and greet.

title: Thiccer is Better - Expansion in all Forms
description:
After Dark (18+)

All forms of body expansion have their place, how about we discuss them and get to know why we love this hefty, or buoyant kink.

title: The Dogmedic Power Hour -- A Comedy Show
description:
After Dark (18+)
Charity



Have you ever thought Dogmedic needs a Netflix stand up special? Well here it is! And it's for charity!* Dogmedic recounts various adventures working as a medic and in the assortment of odd jobs she's held over the years. You, the audience, get to decide what stories you want to hear by donating to the charity. If we reach our stretch goals, you'll be treated to bonuses like Dogmedic and Eevachu revealing their secret handshake, questionable notes on Dogmedic's phone about her various projects, internet challenges, and much more! There may even be hot sauce involved.

title: Registration
description: Registration and convention badge pickup

title: Pre-Reg Pickup
description: Badge pick up for Pre-Registered Attendees

title: Charity - Drop off
description: Drop off any charity items for our silent auction.

title: Attendee Services
description: Our attendee service department is here to help, lost and item, have a question? or looking for accessibility needs. Come on by and say hi!

title: World Building Workshop
description: Have you ever wanted to build a world for yourself, a universe for your characters to exist in, a setting to tell your tales, or simply having fun building fictional universes? Then this is the panel for you! Bring your creativity, bring your characters, bring your worlds, and let’s have some fun!

title: Attendee Services
description: Our attendee service department is here to help, lost and item, have a question? or looking for accessibility needs. Come on by and say hi!

title: Registration
description: Registration and convention badge pickup

title: Super Sponsors Lunch
description: Super Sponsors and above, come enjoy a luncheon and mingle with your fellow furs

title: Super Sponsors Lunch
description: Super Sponsors and above, come enjoy a luncheon and mingle with your fellow furs

title: Fediverse Info and Meet
description: Tired of mainstream social media and corporations ruining everything? In this panel we'll talk about alternatives like Mastodon, Pixelfed, and other platforms on the Fediverse network, run by the community FOR the community.
